rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment uses factual language ('were culled'), lacking high-potency framing.
Contains a containment verb ('culled'), which is Neutral.
Segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
Reports action (culling) but contains no explicit calming cue.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Describes a response measure ('All remaining birds were culled').
